Client.logic

Class GameInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • Client.logic.GameInfo

  • public class GameInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores the information of a game such as mode , tank lives , bullet power and other important settings .

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Generates an instance of GameInfo .

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameInfo

        public GameInfo(java.lang.String gameMode,
                int tankLives,
                int bulletPower,
                int brkWallLives,
                int round)
        Generates an instance of GameInfo .
        Parameters:
        gameMode - String , mode
        tankLives - int , number of lives for a tank
        bulletPower - int , power chosen for bullets
        brkWallLives - int , number of lives for breakable walls
        round - int , number of rounds ( used for league games )
